GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.37
GSD.description:
i2c: imx-lpi2c: fix reference leak when pm_runtime_get_sync fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit cc49d206414240483bb93ffa3d80243e6a776916, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 13d6eb20fc79a1e606307256dad4098375539a09. For more details please see the references link.
